## LinterConfig type

Linter configuration - Linter scope

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type LinterConfig = Required<Config<LinterStringRuleConfig, LinterRulesConfig>>;
```
<b>References:</b> [Config](./core.config.md)<!-- -->, [LinterStringRuleConfig](./core.linterstringruleconfig.md)<!-- -->, [LinterRulesConfig](./core.linterrulesconfig.md)

## Remarks

Same as Config but with every possible property being required. This is the internal config forwarded to every rule. It makes sure that every property is at-least configured with its default value.
